WE WERE PRESENT AT THE MEETING AT JACKSON, DESCRIBED BY SR. WHITE ON PAGES 181, 182, AND REGARD HER STATEMENT CORRECT. 
     A. A. DODGE,        C. DODGE, 
     D. R. PALMER,       A. PALMER, 
     CYRENIUS SMITH,     LOUISA SMITH, 
     J. P. KELLOGG,      ANN J. KELLOGG. 
            J. N. LOUGHBOROUGH. 

                                               -
